posts.text: I swear by my life and my love of it that I will never live for the sake of another man, nor ask another man to live for mine.
I will stop the motor of the world.
I work for nothing but my own profit—which I make by selling a product they need to men who are willing and able to buy it.
I am proud of my wealth.
We will liberate from the most hideous oppression: the oppression of the human spirit.
There's no such thing as a free market. True freedom means fair regulation.
If you think you can get me to surrender, you're mistaken.
I'm taking back what was taken from me, nothing more.
It's not that I don't suffer, it's that I know the unimportance of suffering, I know that pain is to be fought and thrown aside.
Ask yourself whether the dream of heaven and greatness should be waiting for us in our graves—or whether it should be ours here and now and on this earth.
